#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
struct trie_node
{
	int lch,rch,child[2];
}tree[200000];

int T,n,k,nd;
long long res;
void inti()
{
	res=0;
	nd=0;
	tree[0].lch=tree[0].rch=0;
	tree[0].child[0]=tree[0].child[1]=-1;
}
void insert(int st,int x,int idx)
{
	while(idx>=0)
	{
		int d=!(!((1<<idx)&x));
		if(tree[st].child[d]==-1)
		{
			++nd;
			tree[nd].lch=tree[nd].rch=0;
			tree[nd].child[0]=tree[nd].child[1]=-1;
			tree[st].child[d]=nd;
		}
		if(d)tree[st].rch+=1;
		else tree[st].lch+=1;
		st=tree[st].child[d];
		idx--;
	}
}

void query(int st,int x,int idx)
{
	if(idx==-1||st==-1)return;
	int p=x&(1<<idx),q=k&(1<<idx);
	if(q>0)
	{
		if(p==0){
			if(tree[st].child[0]!=-1)res+=tree[st].lch;
			query(tree[st].child[1],x,idx-1);
		}
		else{
			if(tree[st].child[1]!=-1)res+=tree[st].rch;
			query(tree[st].child[0],x,idx-1);
		}
	}
	else{
		if(p)query(tree[st].child[1],x,idx-1);
		else query(tree[st].child[0],x,idx-1);
	}	
}
		
int main()
{
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	{
		scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
		inti();
		insert(0,0,17);
		for(int x,pre=0,i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			scanf("%d",&x);
			pre^=x;
			query(0,pre,17);
			insert(0,pre,17);
		}
		printf("%lld\n",res);	
	}
	return 0;
}
